Name: imageRUNNER 2204N / 2004N / 2004
Features: Designed to meet the needs of small, medium business, the imageRUNNER 2204N / 2004N / 2004 series offers a compact suite of workgroup functionalities. From basic functionalities like copy, print and scan to office connectivity functions such as mobile printing*, the series will fit right into the modern office environment.
Specification: Multi-function network device: copy, print, colour scan
ID Card copy and Department ID Management* (*Only applicable for iR2204N / 2004N)
